General.Name: Eusu Holdings
General.Description: Eusu Holdings Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, provides third-party logistics services worldwide. The company's services include air and marine shipping, overland and railroad transport, customs, project goods transport, warehouse storage, logistics consulting, etc. It also offers customized services, including FMS, WMS, and TMS services; logistics visibility services; rental services; and IT services for the maritime logistics industry. In addition, the company offers smols, a mobile application that allows pet parents to upload photos and short videos of their furry friends. Eusu Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Suk-Hyun  Lee
1.Title: Sr. VP and Chief Strategy Officer
